content: edit 1/13/2021 fiber spider did a tutorial on youtube for those who struggle with the pattern https //www youtube com/watch v=8rp_5drmfq8&feature=share&fbclid=iwar2pebbkuqhkadgvir8nie_65m-_xsog2edkggrvcvjv6-efoh893txaanm update available includes a chart thanks to awilkin01 for noticing me about a little mistake in the pattern ch10 is actually right the written pattern says in round 9 ch8 after the eyes the chart says ch10 which is correct i ll change that as soon as possible i wanted the skulls look at you upright so i made 2 scarfs and connected them in the middle please feel free to share or link to this free pattern if you like to sell finished items you may do so but please honor the designer and treat this pattern as you would wish yours to be treated so please do not sell this pattern it was designed to be shared for free with people who also love to knit and crochet thanks
